"1- You need to form teams of two people, in order to start the game you will need at least two teams.
2- The teams must have a photo and the names of the members to be ready.
3- Once the teams are ready, the game begins.
4- To get closer to the goal and win the Oscar you must be a good actor and guess all the movies you can.
5- During the shift, a team member must achieve by mime that his partner guess the name of the movie he played before time runs out.
6- If your partner guesses the movie, you get one step closer to the goal, otherwise you should ask the other teams if they know the name of the movie and if anyone guessed, they will get the point."
